name: keacast-ai-agent
description: Keacast AI Agent API with Azure OpenAI integration

scripts.deploy:check: node -e "console.log('Environment check:'); console.log('NODE_ENV:', process.env.NODE_ENV); console.log('PORT:', process.env.PORT); console.log('AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT:', process.env.AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT ? 'SET' : 'NOT SET'); console.log('REDIS_HOST:', process.env.REDIS_HOST ? 'SET' : 'NOT SET');"
